results.name: a(n) = A053669(A276086(A276086(n))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..32768
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
formula: For all even n, a(n) > A328569(n).
program: A276086(n) = { my(m=1, p=2); while(n, m *= (p^(n%p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (m); };
A326810(n) = { my(i=1, p=2); while(n && (n%p), n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (p); };
A053669(n) = forprime(p=2, , if(n%p, return(p))); \\ From A053669
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 20 2019
